title: To Taste
alt: Look, recipe, if I knew how much was gonna taste good, I wouldn't need you.
transcript:
[Cueball is standing near a stove holding a pot just above it. He is looking away from the stove, reading the recipe from a piece of paper he is holding in the other hand.]
Recipe: ...And add sugar to taste.[Cueball has placed the pot on the stove looking at it while holding the paper down along his side.]
Cueball:Â ??[Cueball leaves the pot and stove to walks off-panel left with the recipe.][Cueball returns backing up to the stove with a dolly loaded with three crates, labeled "sugar". The bottom crate is still not fully inside the panel and the first letter cannot be seen.]
Sugar
Sugar
ugar
